refsect2.title: tracker_config_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GObject for handling Tracker's config file.

listitem.simpara: A new TrackerConfig object. Must be unreferenced when finished with.

refsect2.title: tracker_config_get_verbosity ()
refsect2.para: Gets the verbosity of the logging in the indexer and the daemon.

If the verbosity is 0, there is no logging except for warnings and errors. If the verbosity is 1, information is displayed. If the verbosity is 2, general messages are displayed. If the verbosity is 3, debug messages are displayed.
Note, you receive logging for anything less priority than the verbosity level as well as the level you set. So if the verbosity is 3 you receive debug, messages, info and warnings.

refsect2.title: The "crawl-directory-roots" property
refsect2.para: This is a GSList of directory roots to index but NOT watch.

refsect2.title: The "disable-indexing-on-battery" property
refsect2.para: Don't index when using AC battery.

refsect2.title: The "disable-indexing-on-battery-init" property
refsect2.para: Don't index when using AC battery initially.

refsect2.title: The "enable-thumbnails" property
refsect2.para: Create thumbnails from image based files.

refsect2.title: The "enable-watches" property
refsect2.para: You can disable all watches by setting this FALSE.

refsect2.title: The "fast-merges" property
refsect2.para: Spends more disk usage if TRUE.

refsect2.title: The "index-mounted-directories" property
refsect2.para: Don't traverse mounted directories which are not on the same file system.

refsect2.title: The "index-removable-devices" property
refsect2.para: Don't traverse mounted directories which are for removable devices.

refsect2.title: The "language" property
refsect2.para: Language to use with stemming ('en', 'fr', 'sv', etc).

refsect2.title: The "low-disk-space-limit" property
refsect2.para: Pause the indexer when the disk space is below this percentage (-1=off, 0->100).

refsect2.title: The "low-memory-mode" property
refsect2.para: Use extra memory at the expense of indexing speed.

refsect2.title: The "max-text-to-index" property
refsect2.para: Maximum text in bytes to index from file's content.

refsect2.title: The "max-word-length" property
refsect2.para: Maximum word length used to index.

refsect2.title: The "max-words-to-index" property
refsect2.para: Maximum unique words to index from file's content.

refsect2.title: The "min-word-length" property
refsect2.para: Minimum word length used to index (0->30).

refsect2.title: The "nfs-locking" property
refsect2.para: In NFS filesystems is not safe to have the lock file in the home directory.

refsect2.title: The "no-index-file-types" property
refsect2.para: This is a GSList of file types to NOT index.

refsect2.title: The "no-watch-directory-roots" property
refsect2.para: This is a GSList of directory roots to NOT index and NOT watch.

refsect2.title: The "throttle" property
refsect2.para: Throttle indexing, higher value is slower (0->20).

refsect2.title: The "watch-directory-roots" property
refsect2.para: This is a GSList of directory roots to index and watch.
